last_episode_to_air.name: Big Shot
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the gang rivalry reaches a boiling point, Franck and Thomas are caught in the crossfire while the cameras are rolling.

name: Dealer
overview: Tensions erupt when two filmmakers infiltrate an area ruled by gangs to shoot a music video for a rapper in this gritty found-footage series.

episodes.name: Spielberg
episodes.overview: In the south of France, Franck and Thomas drive to the hood to work with aspiring rapper Tony when a shootout erupts.

episodes.name: Blow By Blow
episodes.overview: Tony and a label executive push the filmmakers to continue the project. Moussa's mother inadvertently puts everyone in an awkward spot.

episodes.name: Crackhead
episodes.overview: Steve's demands cause Moussa to clash with Tony, who doesn't want a war. Franck tries to persuade Thomas to focus on the unique opportunity ahead.

episodes.name: ARAH!
episodes.overview: Worried about the footage, a youth worker pleads with Tony to use his influence wisely. As cops raid the block, Tony rushes to help Kylian.

episodes.name: Green
episodes.overview: The police puts pressure on Tony to rat on Steve. Tony's sister Jess levels with him. Franck and Tony bond over their career aspirations.

episodes.name: Freestyle
episodes.overview: Steve gives Tony an ultimatum. When the label dismisses Franck's footage, Kylian offers to help him go after shocking material.

episodes.name: Bash
episodes.overview: Kylian puts himself at risk to film the transaction between Tony and Steve. Later, while the hood celebrates, Steve's men exact revenge.

episodes.name: Snitch
episodes.overview: Grappling with the attack on their turf, Moussa rages while Tony offers Jess a way out. Under threat, Franck tells Moussa everything he knows.

episodes.name: Hitmen
episodes.overview: Moussa and Tony wage war on Steve's gang. As the conflict escalates, Franck and Thomas desperately seek safety.

episodes.name: Big Shot
episodes.overview: As the gang rivalry reaches a boiling point, Franck and Thomas are caught in the crossfire while the cameras are rolling.
